title: Amuls
author: Amuls
content: Hello sir/mamI am an expert of English typing.I can do your typing work quickly.1) pdf to ms word file2) Book photoes to ms word file3) Assignment writing4) thesis paper writing5) Story, Novel re-writingAnd any other documents that I can rewrite in English.So if you need to typing then call me.Thank you.Telegram: @Sam240l

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: You could have at least write that post without any typos/mistakes so people can take your add seriously since you said that you are "expert in English typing". By the way, you should move this to Services section instead sharing it in Services Discussion.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Rikafip on August 10, 2023, 06:42:05 AMYou could have at least write that post without any typos/mistakes so people can take your add seriously since you said that you are "expert in English typing". By the way, you should move this to Services section instead sharing it in Services Discussion. I agree with you, the @OP should have improved his/her writing style before offering a service like this. I'm not in any way against the @OP, but I really think that he/she needs to improve his/her English writing skills before offering a service like this because clients often search for the services that offer high quality work , and if someone can't give quality to his/her own thread then we can expect that what level of quality they will be able provide to their clients.I recommend you to fix the typos of your thread and also provide some free vouch copies to the reputed members of the forum who want to test such services. If you get vouches from some reputed members then you chances of getting clients will be increased.

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: Amuls on August 10, 2023, 06:36:16 AM<snip>It would be a great idea to include the result of a typing speed test, and a recorded video would be even better. To further convince people that it is indeed you typing, consider typing your username (perhaps in the URL bar) before beginning the typing test. Additionally, improving the typography of this thread would enhance your presentation. Best of luck!

comments.author: UmerIdrees
comments.body: Quote from: Amuls on August 10, 2023, 06:36:16 AMHello sir/mamI am an expert of English typing.I can do your typing work quickly.1) pdf to ms word file2) Book photoes to ms word file3) Assignment writing4) thesis paper writing5) Story, Novel re-writingAnd any other documents that I can rewrite in English.So if you need to typing then call me.Thank you.Telegram: @Sam240lDo you think you will be get hired by anyone after seeing your post?You have spelling mistakes plus you wrote all this in a very unprofessional way without thinking which letter should be capital or small.If you are serious, come up with a professional post and also include your previous work experience. These days freelancers have their own websites where they showcase their work. Hope you will get ideas from my suggestion and it will help you succeed in the long term.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: Rikafip on August 10, 2023, 06:42:05 AMYou could have at least write that post without any typos/mistakes so people can take your add seriously since you said that you are "expert in English typing".At least he's honest about what "quality" to expect.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on August 10, 2023, 05:23:55 PMAt least he's honest about what "quality" to expect.Maybe only inadvertently since he claimed to be an "expert" .

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: In my opinion you should at the very least try to present your kills in a more pleasant layout and without a doubt correct your spelling errors before you put yourself out there as someone employable. I wish you success.Quote from: Amuls on August 10, 2023, 06:36:16 AMHello sir/mamI am an expert of English typing.I can do your typing work quickly.1) pdf to ms word file2) Book photoes to ms word file3) Assignment writing4) thesis paper writing5) Story, Novel re-writingAnd any other documents that I can rewrite in English.So if you need to typing then call me.Thank you.Telegram: @Sam240l

comments.author: Eh Moo Nah
comments.body: Well, I think he intentionally made some mistakes on His post as part of His Marketing Strategy. most applicants are not good in interview, impressive resume or with solid background but those are the ones who are polite,respectful, humble and willing to learn. as my mentor said : skills can be learned, attitude cannot. Just saying,

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Eh Moo Nah on August 10, 2023, 10:28:50 PMWell, I think he intentionally made some mistakes on His post as part of His Marketing Strategy. How come? if you used the word expert in your service or application you should reflect that in your application or task, it should be unquestionable, that's a very bad marketing strategy he did not proofread his post so how can his client be sure that he will deliver a good service, he did not post a sample of his work, we can forgive this typo error if we can have a sample of his work that is good enough for him to claim that he is an expert.
